remarks: The set of walks (in an undirected graph) as words over the set of vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement:
wwlk $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) -> ( V WWalks E ) = { w e. Word V | ( w =/= (/) /\ A. i e. ( 0 ..^ ( ( # ` w ) - 1 ) ) { ( w ` i ) , ( w ` ( i + 1 ) ) } e. ran E ) } ) $.
$d E i w $.
$d V i w $.
